divs: sighting detailsi was coming back from a delivery going east on jonesboro rd and i just happened to see a blue orb come down from the sky like a comet then pulled up as in raised its elevation back up into the sky into a cloud. simply unbelievable. i dont know how big it was because it was a long way off. im convinced it was maned by the way it flew\acted.
